name: Aramaki
text:
Blocker (After your opponent declares an attack, you may rest this card to make it the new target of the attack.)
Activate: Main Once Per Turn Discard one card from your hand and return 1 cost 2 or lower character to the bottom of its owner's deck. This character gains +3000 power for this turn.
